location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 63 to Rawson Hart Boddam, President and Governor for the Public Department, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter records the arrival (and subsequent departure) of ViperCutter Captain Lieutenant Thomas Hardie and His Majesty's Ship the Active,under command of Captain Simon Mackenzie. It acknowledges receipt of commands including acts of Parliament and congratulates Boddam on his formal appointment to the presidency. The letter also mentions the balance of cash at the settlement at Bushire.
